column4: me hen; Na mehyira wo dzin daa daa daa."

column2: "Daa nyina na mibehyira wo; Na meyi wo dzin ayɛw daa daa daa."

column3: na ɔsɛ ayɛyi ntrado; Na n'akɛseyɛ mu yɛ hwehwɛna."

column2: "Mbasantsen kor bɛkamfo wo ndwuma akyerɛ kor so
"Na adasa keka wo ndzeyɛɛ a ɔyɛ hu no tum no ho asɛm; Na emi dze mebɛka w'akɛseyɛ akyerɛ."
"Wɔbɔtoa wo papayɛ kɛse ne nkaa no ho atsɛn
column3: Na wɔatow wo ndzeyɛtsenenee ho ndwom."
na mbɔbɔrhu ahyɛ no ma; Ɔfa ebufuw nyaa
Na n'ayamuhyehye wɔ no ndwuma nyinara do."
wo ndwuma nyinara dze ndaase bɛma wo; Na w'ahotseweefo behyira wo."
Na w'ahendzi no tum n'enyimnyam no."
Na w'ahenman wɔ hɔ mbasantsen nyinara mu."

column2: "EWURADZE wowaw hɔn a wɔhwe ase nyinara
column3: Na ɔma hɔn a wɔbrɛ adze do."

column2: "Enyiwaenyiwa nyinara hwɛ wo kwan; Na ɔwo ema hɔn hɔn edziban wɔ n'aber ano."

column3: Na ema atseasefo nyinara nya hɔn akɔndɔdze mee."
Na ɔyɛ adom wɔ no ndwuma nyinara mu."

column2: "EWURADZE bɛn hɔn a wɔfrɛ no nyinara
column3: Hɔn a wosu frɛ no nokwar mu nyinara."

column2: "Ɔbɛma hɔn a wosuro no no hɔn apɛdze ayɛ hɔ; Obetsie hɔn nkekamu so na ɔagye hɔn nkwa."
"EWURADZE kora hɔn a wɔdɔ no nyinara do
"M'ano bɛka EWURADZE n'ayɛyi; Na wɔmma honam nyinara nhyira ne dzin krɔnkrɔn no daa daa daa."
